page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: THE SCHOOL HAS THIRTY EIGHT CHILDREN. THE CHILDREN'S AGES ARE FROM FOUR AND A HALF TO ELEVEN AND A HALF.THEY HAVE THREE TEACHERS, TWO ARE FULL TIME AND ONE IS HALF TIME. THIRTY ONE CHILDREN HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS AND SEVEN HAVE PACKED LUNCHES. ABOUT TWENTY SIX CHILDREN GO HOME BY BUS OR CAR.THE GREATEST DISTANCE WHICH ANY CHILD TRAVELS IS ABOUT SIX MILES.CHILDREN ARRIVE AT SCHOOL AT HALF PAST EIGHT AND LEAVE AT HALF PAST THREE. THE SCHOOL HAS A COOK/A KITCHEN HELPER,A SECRETARY,A CARETAKER,AND A DINNER TIME SUPERVISOR.THERE ARE THREE TEACHING AREAS.THE SCHOOL HAS A LARGE PLAYING FIELD AND A PLAYGROUND SURROUNDED BY FLOWER BORDERS.
